resources.string: We hope you had a great time away. Ready to plan your next holiday? Feel free to browse our great range of holidays. Or contact us about your recent trip.
Calls are charged at 5p/min + network rates
If you would like to discuss your holiday once you’ve returned, please contact our After Travel Customer Support team.
If you would like to discuss your holiday once you've returned, please contact our After Travel Customer Support team or pop into your local Thomson travel shop.

After travel customer support
Thomson Holidays
Wigmore House
Wigmore Lane
Luton
LU2 9TN
Please ensure you include your booking reference details in your communication
Ready to plan your next holiday?
Feel free to browse our great range of holidays

Your booking includes more than 1 hotel or 2 flights.

Sorry,\nyou can’t use the app if:
I haven’t booked a Thomson holiday

We’ll send your booking reference number by email when your MyThomson app is ready to use. You should expect to receive it 3-4 days after booking a holiday directly with Thomson, in store, online or over the phone. If you have forgotten your booking reference number, please enter your details below.
Please use the email address you provided when booking your holiday, as detailed on your invoice.
Sorry, we didn't recognise your details.
The first part of your booking reference number must be 4 numbers long. The second set can be between 4 and 8 numbers long.
Thank you. We have sent you booking reference number to the specified email address. Please check your inbox and then log in below.
Please use the surname of the person that booked your holiday, as detailed on your invoice.
Sorry, you can't use the app if your departure date is after 1st November 2015.

We apologise, but due to system changes, we are currently unable to support bookings departing from 1st November 2015 on the MyThomson app. We are working on this and will contact you when the service becomes available. Sorry for any inconvenience, the MyThomson app team.

Your lead passenger surname. (That’s the person that booked your holiday and receives all correspondence).::Your departure date.::Your booking reference number. It looks like this: 1234/12345678. The first number is four digits long. The second number is 4-8 digits long.
Your lead passenger surname. (That’s the person that booked your holiday and receives all correspondence).
Your booking reference number. It looks like this: 1234/12345678. The first number is four digits long. The second number is 4-8 digits long.
You can log in to the MyThomson app 3-4 days after you have made your booking. We’ll notify you by email when your personalised MyThomson app is ready to use.
If you’re still having problems logging in, please let us know by email.

We're sorry you're having problems logging in to the MyThomson app. Please fill in the details below and check that everything’s correct. We’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

Lead passenger surname: 
Departure date: 
Booking reference number: 
The email address you booked your holiday with: 
Postcode: 
Your query:

Operating system: [os]
Phone type: [phone]

I can't log in to MyThomson
Sorry some of our content hasn’t loaded correctly. Please try viewing another page or close the app and connect again later.
Sorry to view this page internet connection is required. Please refresh the page.
Makes every summer even more beautiful: sun, sand and sea. Find your place in the sun!
Welcome to your mobile travel world! Find out what dream destinations await you – and which services this app keeps for you.
Here, everything revolves around you: quality, service and comfort - made for you.
Replenish your energy, you will find new inspiration and inner relaxation on the most exciting spots worldwide.
Those looking for originality and tranquility will feel quite at home here.
For the highest standards: pleasure and comfort at its best at premium spots worldwide.
Make the most of your vacation: Nightlife, action and relaxation. Here waits the full program!
You want to stay active during your vacation? Pamper your body and spirit.
The MyThomson app is for people who have booked a holiday directly with Thomson. To discover all of the great benefits of the MyThomson app, take a tour, then choose the perfect holiday for you.
Exclusive to Thomson package holiday customers
Exclusive Holiday Collections Designed For You, By Thomson

The MyThomson app is for customers who have booked directly with Thomson in store, online or over the phone. You can log in to your personalised MyThomson app 3-4 days after you have made your booking.
If you are a Thomson Cruises or First Choice customer you can still manage your holiday at:
Tip: The booking reference number you received in the email ‘Your booking and MyThomson log in details’ a few days after you booked. It looks like this: 1234/567891. The number of digits may vary.
Please check each field matches your booking details.
Tip: The date that you fly out to your destination.
Tip: The surname of the person that booked your holiday.
You didn’t book directly with Thomson.::You’ve booked a Thomson Cruise.::You’ve booked a First Choice holiday through Thomson.

We hope you had a great holiday with us.
Welcome to your personalised travel companion. Check back for handy tips and updates!
Got a question about your booking? We're here to help if you need us.
Welcome to [location]! We hope you have a great holiday. If you need anything, just get in touch.
Welcome to your [appName] app, your perfect travel companion.
Book these great holiday extras here or at your local Thomson shop:
Pop in to your local Thomson travel shop to get 0% commission on all foreign currency, along with:
Competitive rates::No last-minute airport prices::A range of currencies and travellers' cheques

You can now beat the queues by checking in online and printing your boarding card.
Book these great holiday extras here or at your local Thomson shop:
If you are flying with Thomson Airways and your flight departs before 12.00 midday, you can drop your bags at the airport from 12.00 midday to 22:00 the day before you fly.
Your flights are confirmed six weeks before you depart. When they’re ready, we’ll display your full flight details here.
All flight times are based on local times. Flight timings and airline details are subject to change.
With our great range of excursions

• MyMessages – this is where you can find useful, real-time updates about your holiday.\n• In-app feedback: you can rate the app and send your thoughts straight to our team.\n• Push notifications: if you enable these, we can now send you useful updates about your holiday, like online check-in, Select-your-Seat and exclusive offers.
